class ImageShiftCorrelationBased[source]

ImageShiftCorrelationBased(shape, upsample_factor=10, method='cross_correlation', dtype=torch.float32, device=device(type='cuda'))

Class written to register stack of images for AET. Uses correlation based method to determine subpixel shift between predicted and measured images. Input parameters:

- shape: shape of the image
- pixel_size: pixel size of the image
- upsample_factor: precision of shift algorithm, to 1/upsample_factor accuracy.
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class ImageShiftGradientBased[source]

ImageShiftGradientBased(shape, dtype=torch.float32, device=device(type='cuda'), **kwargs) :: Module

A class that solves for shift between measurement and prediction. This uses pytorch autograd, and is gradient based.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
